Nano Posts

A CRUD app for note taking

Created using: HTML, Bootstrap, JavaScript and Babel


A CRUD webapp where users can add, remove, edit and delete posts. The posts are saved in a local JSON api.

The app was designed to seperate the logic, functionality and the UI. For this reason I took the decision to implement the Module design pattern

Data is stored locally in a backend JSON API and is retrieved using local storage.
